txt.en: 'Please, defeat some of the wolves beyond our camps so that they will not dare to come so close.'
You should defeat wolves in the areas around the refugee encampments, east and across the river from Dale.
DNT Defeat enemies in and around the camps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Among the Refugees: Wolves at Bay
DNT Defeat enemies in and around the camps ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
You should return to Komúsi, who can be found in the Dorwinion camp, in the hills east of Dale.
DNT Defeat enemies in and around the camps
'Though the pack leader is gone, wolves still harry us when we wander too far from our camps. If you would fell some more of them, [placeholder], you will scare the rest away... at least for a time.'
Wolves still attack the Easterling refugees when they stray from their camps.
'The wolves will fall back into the deep trees and not bother us, at least for a spell. Thank you, [placeholder].'
